title: A Flock of Birds under a Tree including a Crowned Eagle with a Heraldic Blazon on its Wings
description: A Flock of Birds under a Tree including a Crowned Eagle with a Heraldic Blazon on its Wings; Unknown; Trier (probably), Germany; third quarter of 15th century; Pen and black ink and colored washes on paper; Leaf: 28.7 x 20.6 cm (11 5/16 x 8 1/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 1, fol. 18v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
